humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that two sentinel lymph nodes were examined and both were negative for metastases (0/1 and 0/1). This information aligns with New Rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/2.' This means that two sentinel lymph nodes were examined and both were negative for metastases, which corresponds to an N0 stage.
